info.title: Schema of Azure HealthcareApis events published to Azure Event Grid.
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure HealthcareApis events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

FhirResourceCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.HealthcareApis.FhirResourceCreated event.

ResourceFhirAccount.description: Domain name of FHIR account for this resource.

ResourceVersionId.description: VersionId of HL7 FHIR resource. It changes when the resource is created, updated, or deleted.

FhirResourceUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.HealthcareApis.FhirResourceUpdated event.

ResourceFhirAccount.description: Domain name of FHIR account for this resource.

ResourceVersionId.description: VersionId of HL7 FHIR resource. It changes when the resource is created, updated, or deleted.

FhirResourceDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.HealthcareApis.FhirResourceDeleted event.

ResourceFhirAccount.description: Domain name of FHIR account for this resource.

ResourceVersionId.description: VersionId of HL7 FHIR resource. It changes when the resource is created, updated, or deleted.
